languages.text: {n}Вокс Паскаля отвечает твердо и с ноткой возмущения:{/n} "Я отрицаю данные обвинения. Я не злоумышлял против своего технобрата, мои когнитивные обеты чистоты не были подвергнуты искажению, мой уникальный идентификационный код не был украден. Я — истинный Магос Эксплоратор Ханейманн, и я не виновен".

{n}Pasqal replies firmly, his vox crackling with a hint of indignation,{/n} "I deny these charges. I never plotted against my tech-comrade. My cognitive purity vows were never distorted. My unique identification code was never stolen. I am the true Magos Explorator Haneumann, and I am not guilty."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля отвечает твердо и с ноткой возмущения:{/n} "Я отрицаю данные обвинения. Я не злоумышлял против своего технобрата, мои когнитивные обеты чистоты не были подвергнуты искажению, мой уникальный идентификационный код не был украден. Я — истинный Магос Эксплоратор Ханейманн, и я не виновен".

My unique identification code was never stolen. I am the true Magos Explorator Haneumann, and I am not guilty."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルが毅然と答えると、ヴォクスから憤怒の色を帯びた音が流れる。{/n}「自分はこれら告発を否認します。自分は技術同胞に対して陰謀を企てたことは一切ありません。自分の認知のピュリティも歪んだことはない。自分固有の識別コードが盗まれたこともない。自分が本物のマゴス冒険家ヘニュマンです。そして自分は、無罪なのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal replies firmly, his vox crackling with a hint of indignation,{/n} "I deny these charges. I never plotted against my tech-comrade. My cognitive purity vows were never distorted. My unique identification code was never stolen. I am the true Magos Explorator Haneumann, and I am not guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルが毅然と答えると、ヴォクスから憤怒の色を帯びた音が流れる。{/n}「自分はこれら告発を否認します。自分は技術同胞に対して陰謀を企てたことは一切ありません。自分の認知のピュリティも歪んだことはない。自分固有の識別コードが盗まれたこともない。自分が本物のマゴス冒険家ヘニュマンです。そして自分は、無罪なのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的声音充满了坚决，还带着一丝愤慨。{/n}“我否认上述指控。我从来没有密谋反对过我的技术伙伴，我的纯洁认知誓言从来没有被扭曲过。我唯一的身份识别代码从来没有被盗取过，我是真正的哈努曼贤者，我是无罪的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal replies firmly, his vox crackling with a hint of indignation,{/n} "I deny these charges. I never plotted against my tech-comrade. My cognitive purity vows were never distorted. My unique identification code was never stolen. I am the true Magos Explorator Haneumann, and I am not guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的声音充满了坚决，还带着一丝愤慨。{/n}“我否认上述指控。我从来没有密谋反对过我的技术伙伴，我的纯洁认知誓言从来没有被扭曲过。我唯一的身份识别代码从来没有被盗取过，我是真正的哈努曼贤者，我是无罪的。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals antwortet mit fester Stimme. Im Ton seines Vox-Systems knistert ein Hauch von Entrüstung:{/n} "Ich leugne diese Vorwürfe. Ich habe nie gegen meine Techkameraden gearbeitet. Meine kognitiven Reinheitsschwüre wurden niemals gebrochen. Mein einzigartiger Identifikationscode wurde niemals gestohlen. Ich bin der echte Magos-Explorator Haneumann, und ich bin unschuldig."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal replies firmly, his vox crackling with a hint of indignation,{/n} "I deny these charges. I never plotted against my tech-comrade. My cognitive purity vows were never distorted. My unique identification code was never stolen. I am the true Magos Explorator Haneumann, and I am not guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Vox antwortet fest, mit einem Hauch von Entrüstung:{/n} "Ich leugne diese Vorwürfe. Ich habe nie gegen meine Techkameraden gearbeitet. Meine kognitiven Reinheitsschwüre wurden niemals gebrochen. Mein einzigartiger Identifikationscode wurde niemals gestohlen. Ich bin der echte Magos-Explorator Haneumann, und ich bin unschuldig."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}C'est d'un ton ferme mâtiné d'indignation que Pasqal vous répond :{/n} « Je nie en bloc ces accusations infondées. Je n'ai jamais comploté contre mes technoconfrères, pas plus que je n'ai trahi mes vœux de pureté cognitive. Mon code d'identification n'est pas usurpé. Je suis le véritable magos explorator Haneumann, et je suis innocent des crimes qui me sont reprochés. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal replies firmly, his vox crackling with a hint of indignation,{/n} "I deny these charges. I never plotted against my tech-comrade. My cognitive purity vows were never distorted. My unique identification code was never stolen. I am the true Magos Explorator Haneumann, and I am not guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}C'est d'un ton ferme mâtiné d'indignation que Pasqal vous répond :{/n} « Je nie en bloc ces accusations infondées. Je n'ai jamais comploté contre mes technoconfrères, pas plus que je n'ai trahi mes vœux de pureté cognitive. Mon code d'identification n'est pas usurpé. Je suis le véritable magos explorator Haneumann, et je suis innocent des crimes qui me sont reprochés. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El voco sintetizador de Pasqal responde con firmeza, chisporroteando con un toque de indignación.{/n} «Refuto esos cargos. Jamás he conspirado contra mi tecnocamarada. Mis votos de pureza cognitiva no se han roto nunca. En la vida me han sustraído mi código de identificación exclusivo. Yo soy el auténtico Magos explorador Haneumann, y me declaro inocente».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal replies firmly, his vox crackling with a hint of indignation,{/n} "I deny these charges. I never plotted against my tech-comrade. My cognitive purity vows were never distorted. My unique identification code was never stolen. I am the true Magos Explorator Haneumann, and I am not guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}El vocosintetizador de Pasqal responde con firmeza y un toque de indignación.{/n} «Refuto esos cargos. Jamás he conspirado contra mi tecnocamarada. Mis votos de pureza cognitiva no se han roto nunca. En la vida me han sustraído mi código de identificación exclusivo. Yo soy el auténtico magos explorador Haneumann, y me declaro inocente».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Voksu öfkeyle tıkırdayan Pasqal, tereddütsüzce yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Bu suçlamaları reddetmekteyim. Tekno yoldaşıma asla kumpas kurmadım. Bilişsel saflık yeminlerim asla bozulmadı. Eşsiz kimlik saptama kodum asla çalınmadı. Ben gerçek Magos Keşiftör Haneumann'ım ve suçlu değilim."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal replies firmly, his vox crackling with a hint of indignation,{/n} "I deny these charges. I never plotted against my tech-comrade. My cognitive purity vows were never distorted. My unique identification code was never stolen. I am the true Magos Explorator Haneumann, and I am not guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voksu öfkeyle tıkırdayan Pasqal, tereddütsüzce yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Bu suçlamaları reddetmekteyim. Tekno yoldaşıma karşı asla bir kumpas kurmadım. Bilişsel saflık yeminlerim asla bozulmadı. Eşsiz kimlik saptama kodum asla çalınmadı. Ben gerçek Magos Keşiftör Haneumann'ım ve suçlu değilim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
